attributes.action: Only sober MP's allowed to vote.
attributes.additional_details: You can't drive a car whilst drunk. So why should MP's 'drive' the country when drunk. They have many millions of pedestrians to look out for.
attributes.background: Mp's should be liable to random breath testing for excessive alcohol.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you'd like there to be a rule against MPs voting in the House of Commons after they've consumed a certain amount of alcohol, you could start a new petition asking for that.
